paper_abstract: This paper proposed a web-based Google Map of the campus tour photo messaging system. When users use this system, the web page will show them information of the selected location in the map and photos, 360 degree panorama image, browse a message for the viewer further. The system uses digital camera to take photos, showing the location of the campus locations and display photos on the map in the Google Maps. Users can utilize the message board to leave comments or record message. This proposed application includes message boards, Google Maps API key and Dreamweaver web design application.
paper_title: Building a Campus Tour Platform of Integrating Google Maps API and Panorama Technology
